items.a: I’m Samyam, a Data Analyst / QA Engineer / Software Developer with 3+ years across QA automation, data visualization, IT support, and full-stack work. I like combining a QA mindset (edge cases, reliability) with data skills (SQL, Python, BI dashboards) and software engineering (C++, .NET, web) to ship systems that are both accurate and usable.

I’m targeting Data Analyst, Business Analyst, QA Engineer, and hybrid Data/QA or Software roles where I can own pipelines, validate data and features, build dashboards and tools, and partner closely with stakeholders to turn requirements into reliable, measurable outcomes.

SQL (MySQL, Oracle), Python (Pandas/NumPy), Power BI, Tableau, Excel; QA automation with Cypress, Postman, Swagger, JMeter; Programming in C++, C#, JavaScript, Dart, Java, .NET, Node.js, Flutter; Data modeling, DAX, dashboard design; Agile/Scrum, JIRA, CI/CD, documentation, ticket triage, and cross-functional communication.

Recently I’ve been a Technical Support Assistant and Python Teaching Assistant at the University of New Haven, where I resolve 500+ tickets, support MFA/software installs, improve an AI chatbot knowledge base, and build basic reports and dashboards. Before that I worked as a Mid-Level QA/QC Engineer and QA Trainee testing a global EdTech and fintech products with Cypress, Postman, and JMeter.
Cooking, listening to music, watching movies, and cafe hopping.

I’m an international student in the U.S. completing my MS in Information Science (STEM). I’ll be eligible for 12-month post-completion OPT plus a 24-month STEM extension after graduation (expected Dec 2025), and I’m open to internships, co-ops, and full-time roles aligned with that timeline.
